answers.answer: Hi,It could be related to your diabetes, especially if your glucose levels are not well controlled, and also could be secondary to medications you are taking. This is best discussed with your doctor who can examine you for signs of muscle or nerve problems related to diabetes, as well as review your medications and labs.take care.
